BAC_custom_idEntityNumber_100000002|SELECT customId,customName,customType,identityNumber FROM BAC_CUSTOM WHERE CUSTOMID IN (SELECT CUSTOMID FROM BAC_USER WHERE USERID ='900002')||BAC_account_userId_900002|SELECT acctId,acctName,acctSource,acctStatus,acctType,bindMobile,TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(createTime) - TO_DATE('1970-01-01 8:0:0', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 86400000 AS createTime,identityNumber,TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(invalidTime) - TO_DATE('1970-01-01 8:0:0', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 86400000 AS invalidTime,userId,TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(validTime) - TO_DATE('1970-01-01 8:0:0', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 86400000 AS validTime FROM BAC_ACCOUNT WHERE userid='900002'||BAC_user_userId_900002|SELECT acctStatus,TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(createTime) - TO_DATE('1970-01-01 8:0:0', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 86400000 AS createTime,customId,innerUserId,userEmail,userId,userMobile,userName,userSource,userType FROM BAC_USER WHERE USERID ='900002'
